message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe is of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15000?

Bob, I understand your budget, but I'm also mindful of the value of this product.  To make this work for both of us, I'm willing to come down to $17500. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows you to stay within your budget.
